prodNameC: 諾法鐵人類抗水痘帶狀皰疹病毒免疫球蛋白M酵素免疫分析套組
ingredientsDesc:
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS Coated Wells (IgM): 12 breakapart 8-well snap-off strips coated with VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS recombinant antigen.
IgM Sample Diluent: 1 bottle containing 100 ml of buffer for sample dilution; containing antihuman-IgM; pH 7.2 ± 0.2.
Stop Solution: containing 15 ml sulphuric acid, 0.2 mol/l.
Washing Solution (20x conc.): containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer (pH 7.2 ± 0.2) for washing the wells.
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS anti-IgM Conjugate: containing 20 ml of peroxidase labelled rabbit antibody to human IgM.
TMB Substrate Solution: containing 15 ml 
3,3,5,5-tetramethylbenzidine (TMB).
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS IgM Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 2 ml.
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS IgM Cut-off Control: 1 bottle containing 2 ml.
VARICELLA ZOSTER VIRUS IgM Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 2 ml.
* contains 0.01 % Kathon after dilution
** contains 0.2 % Bronidox L
*** contains 0.1 % Kathon
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 利用酵素免疫分析法定性檢測人類血清中抗人類水痘帶狀皰疹病毒之免疫球蛋白M分類抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3900 水痘帶狀皰疹病毒血清試劑
